python.name: Python
python.description: Python is a programming language that lets you work quickly and integrate systems more effectively.

python-intel.name: Python (Intel)
python-intel.description: Python is a programming language that lets you work quickly and integrate systems more effectively. Optimized for Intel CPUs.

python-ff.name: Lablup Platform
python-ff.description: Lablup Research Platform is full-featured all-in-one research environment for machine learning and data science maintained by Lablup Inc.

python-tensorflow.name: TensorFlow
python-tensorflow.description: TensorFlow is an end-to-end open source platform for machine learning. It has a comprehensive, flexible ecosystem of tools, libraries and community resources that lets researchers push the state-of-the-art in ML and developers easily build and deploy ML powered applications.

python-tfx.name: TensorFlow Extended
python-tfx.description: TensorFlow Extended (TFX) is an end-to-end platform for deploying production ML pipelines.

python-pytorch.name: PyTorch
python-pytorch.description: PyTorch is an open source machine learning framework that accelerates the path from research prototyping to production deployment.

python-chainer.name: Chainer
python-chainer.description: Chainer is a powerful, flexible and intuitive deep learning framework.

python-caffe.name: Caffe
python-caffe.description: Caffe is a deep learning framework made with expression, speed, and modularity in mind.

python-mxnet.name: MXNet
python-mxnet.description: MXNet is an open source deep learning framework suited for flexible research prototyping and production.

julia-tensorflow.name: TensorFlow (Julia)
julia-tensorflow.description: This is Julia-integrated TensorFlow environment. TensorFlow is an end-to-end open source platform for machine learning. It has a comprehensive, flexible ecosystem of tools, libraries and community resources that lets researchers push the state-of-the-art in ML and developers easily build and deploy ML powered applications.

ngc-digits.name: DIGITS (NGC)
ngc-digits.description: This environment is integrated with Nvidia GPU Cloud.

ngc-tensorflow.name: TensorFlow (NGC)
ngc-tensorflow.description: TensorFlow is an end-to-end open source platform for machine learning. It has a comprehensive, flexible ecosystem of tools, libraries and community resources that lets researchers push the state-of-the-art in ML and developers easily build and deploy ML powered applications. This environment is integrated with Nvidia GPU Cloud.

ngc-pytorch.name: PyTorch (NGC)
ngc-pytorch.description: PyTorch is an open source machine learning framework that accelerates the path from research prototyping to production deployment. This environment is integrated with Nvidia GPU Cloud.

ngc-caffe2.name: Caffe 2 (NGC)
ngc-caffe2.description: Caffe2 is a deep learning framework that provides an easy and straightforward way for you to experiment with deep learning and leverage community contributions of new models and algorithms. This environment is integrated with Nvidia GPU Cloud.

ngc-caffe3.name: Caffe (NGC, Python 3)
ngc-caffe3.description: Caffe is a deep learning framework made with expression, speed, and modularity in mind. This environment is integrated with Nvidia GPU Cloud.

ngc-nvcaffe.name: NVCaffe (NGC)
ngc-nvcaffe.description: Caffe is a deep-learning framework made with flexibility, speed, and modularity in mind. NVCaffe is an NVIDIA-maintained fork of BVLC Caffe tuned for NVIDIA GPUs, particularly in multi-GPU configurations. This environment is integrated with Nvidia GPU Cloud.

ngc-mxnet.name: MXNet (NGC)
ngc-mxnet.description: MXNet is an open source deep learning framework suited for flexible research prototyping and production. This environment is integrated with Nvidia GPU Cloud.

ngc-triton.name: Triton Server (NGC)
ngc-triton.description: PyTorch is an open source machine learning framework that accelerates the path from research prototyping to production deployment. This environment is integrated with Nvidia GPU Cloud.

ngc-matlab.name: MATLAB (NGC)
ngc-matlab.description: MATLAB® combines a desktop environment tuned for iterative analysis and design processes with a programming language that expresses matrix and array mathematics directly. This environment is integrated with Nvidia GPU Cloud.

matlab.name: MATLAB
matlab.description: MATLAB® combines a desktop environment tuned for iterative analysis and design processes with a programming language that expresses matrix and array mathematics directly.

intel-tensorflow.name: TensorFlow (Intel MKL)
intel-tensorflow.description: TensorFlow is an end-to-end open source platform for machine learning. It has a comprehensive, flexible ecosystem of tools, libraries and community resources that lets researchers push the state-of-the-art in ML and developers easily build and deploy ML powered applications. This environment is optimized with Intel MKL.

intel-python.name: Python (Intel MKL)
intel-python.description: Python is a programming language that lets you work quickly and integrate systems more effectively. This environment is optimized with Intel MKL.

julia.name: Julia
julia.description: Julia was designed from the beginning for high performance.

r.name: R (legacy)
r.description: R is a free software environment for statistical computing and graphics.

r-base.name: R
r-base.description: R is a free software environment for statistical computing and graphics.

c.name: C
c.description: C is a procedural programming language.

cpp.name: C++
cpp.description: C++ is a cross-platform language that can be used to create high-performance applications.

gcc.name: GCC
gcc.description: The GNU Compiler Collection includes front ends for C, C++, Objective-C, Fortran, Ada, Go, and D, as well as libraries for these languages (libstdc++,...).

rust.name: Rust
rust.description: Rust is a modern systems programming language focusing on safety, speed, and concurrency. It accomplishes these goals by being memory safe without using garbage collection.

octave.name: GNU Octave
octave.description: GNU Octave is an free scientific programming language that provides powerful mathematics-oriented syntax with built-in plotting and visualization tools.

php.name: PHP
php.description: PHP is a general-purpose programming language originally designed for web development.

scala.name: Scala
scala.description: Scala is a general-purpose programming language providing support for functional programming and a strong static type system.

fortran-caf.name: Fortran
fortran-caf.description: Fortran is a general-purpose, compiled imperative programming language that is especially suited to numeric computation and scientific computing.

spectravis.name: SpectraVis
spectravis.description: An interactive network visualization tool for exploring functional brain connectivity using d3.js.

neurodebian.name: NeuroDebian
neurodebian.description: NeuroDebian provides a large collection of popular neuroscience research software for the Debian operating system as well as Ubuntu and other derivatives.

afni.name: AFNI
afni.description: AFNI (Analysis of Functional NeuroImages) is a leading software suite of C, Python, R programs and shell scripts primarily developed for the analysis and display of anatomical and functional MRI (FMRI) data.

texlive.name: TeXLive
texlive.description: TeX Live is an easy (we hope) way to get up and running with the TeX document production system.

ubuntu-linux.name: Ubuntu Linux
ubuntu-linux.description: Ubuntu is an open source software operating system that runs from the desktop, to the cloud, to all your internet connected things.

kubuntu-linux.name: Kubuntu Linux
kubuntu-linux.description: Kubuntu is an official flavour of the Ubuntu operating system that uses the KDE Plasma Desktop instead of the GNOME desktop environment. As part of the Ubuntu project, Kubuntu uses the same underlying systems.

lablup-pytorch.name: PyTorch (Cloudia)
lablup-pytorch.description: PyTorch is an open source machine learning framework that accelerates the path from research prototyping to production deployment. This environment is fully integrated with Cloudia platform.
